description:
A staple midlayer for dedicated mountain goers. This midweight fleece hoody is made with 96% recycled Thermic™ G stretch fleece, providing warmth and breathability on hikes, scrambles, and mountaineering adventures.

Providing warmth, breathability and fast wicking performance, the Graviton Hoody is a versatile mountain midlayer. With excellent stretch and set-in sleeves for complete mobility and a slim fit, it’s ideal for layering on mountain ascents where climbing, ropes or a harness may be needed. It has an under-helmet hood for added warmth on exposed terrain, perfect for a windy ridge or plateau. The dropped hem at the back neatly covers over the back of the hips for a seamless fit under a harness. Packable, warm and temperature regulating, the Graviton Hoody is ideal for all mountain adventures.
name: Rab Graviton Hoody - Mens
